APKiD_Scan_APK_DEX_JAR.description: APKiD identifies many compilers, packers, obfuscators, and other weird stuff from an APK or DEX file.

AbuseIPDB.description: check if an ip was reported on AbuseIPDB

max_age.description: How many days back you want to check for reports. Default 180

max_reports.description: How many reports you want to save. Default 200

verbose.description: Reports are included in this response if you enable this flag. Omitting the verbose flag will exclude reports and the country name field. If you want to keep your response payloads light, this is recommended

Anomali_Threatstream_Confidence.description: Analyzer for threatstream API Confidence, give max, average and min confidence of entries for an observable

threatstream_analysis.description: API in threatstream called is Confidence one

Anomali_Threatstream_Intelligence.description: Analyzer for threatstream API Intelligence (main threat intelligence information)

threatstream_analysis.description: API in threatstream called is Intelligence one

modified_after.description: Filter on entries modified after a specific date. Date must be specified in this format: YYYYMMDDThhmmss where T denotes the start of the value for time, in UTC time. For example, 2014-10-02T20:44:35.

Anomali_Threatstream_PassiveDNS.description: Return information from passive dns of Anomali.

threatstream_analysis.description: API in threatstream called is passive_dns one

Auth0.description: scan an IP against the Auth0 API

BitcoinAbuse.description: Check a BTC address against bitcoinabuse.com, a public database of BTC addresses used by hackers and criminals.

BoxJS_Scan_JavaScript.description: A tool for studying JavaScript malware

CheckDMARC.description: An SPF and DMARC DNS records validator

CheckPhish.description: [CheckPhish](https://checkphish.ai/checkphish-api/) can detect phishing and fraudulent sites

polling_tries.description: How many times we poll the CheckPhish API for scan results

polling_time.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to CheckPhish APIs

CIRCLPassiveDNS.description: scan an observable against the CIRCL Passive DNS DB

CIRCLPassiveSSL.description: scan an observable against the CIRCL Passive SSL DB

Classic_DNS.description: Retrieve current domain resolution with default DNS

query_type.description: Query type against the chosen DNS resolver.

CloudFlare_DNS.description: Retrieve current domain resolution with CloudFlare DoH (DNS over HTTPS)

CloudFlare_Malicious_Detector.description: Scan an observable against CloudFlare DB

Capa_Info.description: capa detects capabilities in executable files

Capa_Info_Shellcode.description: capa detects capabilities in shellcode files

arch.description: Change system architecture for the shellcode (32 or 64).

shellcode.description: true if the file is a shellcode.

CapeSandbox.description: Automatic scan of suspicious files using CapeSandbox API

url_key_name.description: URL for the CapeSandbox instance. If none provided, It uses the API provided by CAPESandbox by default.

VM_NAME.description: The VM to be used in the analysis.

max_tries.description: Number of max tries while trying to poll the CAPESandbox API.

poll_distance.description: Seconds to wait before moving on to the next poll attempt.

Censys_Search.description: scan an IP address against Censys View API

ClamAV.description: scan files using ClamAV virus scanning engine

CryptoScamDB_CheckAPI.description: Scan a cryptocurrency address, IP address, domain or ENS name against the [CryptoScamDB](https://cryptoscamdb.org/) API.

CRXcavator.description: Scans a chrome extension against crxcavator.io service. Every Chrome-Extension has a unique alpha=numeric identifier. That's the only Input necessary. Eg: `Norton Safe Search Enhanced`'s identifier is `eoigllimhcllmhedfbmahegmoakcdakd`.

Cuckoo_Scan.description: scan a file on a Cuckoo instance

CyberChef.description: Bake an input with a selected CyberChef Recipe

recipe_name.description: Name of pre-defined recipe to use.

recipe_code.description: Custom recipe to use (instead of a predefined one). [Here](https://github.com/mattnotmax/cyberchef-recipes) are some sample recipes. NOTE: This is only read if recipe_name is blank

output_type.description: Output type of the recipe. Leave blank to use default. Available output types are listed [here](https://github.com/gchq/CyberChef/wiki/Adding-a-new-operation#data-types)

Cymru_Hash_Registry_Get_File.description: Check if a particular file is known to be malware by Team Cymru

Cymru_Hash_Registry_Get_Observable.description: Check if a particular hash is available in the malware hash registry of Team Cymru

Dehashed_Search.description: Query against Dehashed's search API. For configuration, refer to the 'Sizing & Pagination' section in [dehashed docs](https://www.dehashed.com/docs).

api_key_name.description: Combination of your dehashed account's email and API key. Format: `email:api-key`.

size.description: Number of records fetched. Recommend change to a large value.

pages.description: Number of pages fetched. Recommend to keep at 1 only to save on credits.

operator.description: Search Operator to use among (id, email, ip_address, username, password, hashed_password, hash_type, name, vin, address, phone, database_name). Default: username

DNSDB.description: Scan an observable against the Passive DNS Farsight Database (support both v1 and v2 versions). Official [API docs](https://docs.dnsdb.info/dnsdb-apiv2/).

limit.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

query_type.description: Query type. Options: domain (default), rrname-wildcard-left, rrname-wildcard-right, names, rdata-wildcard-left, rdata-wildcard-right

DNStwist.description: scans for potentially malicious permutations of a domain name

tld.description: Check for domains with different TLDs by supplying a dictionary file.

mxcheck.description: Find suspicious mail servers and flag them with SPYING-MX string.

ssdeep.description: Enable fuzzy hashing - compare HTML content of original domain with a potentially malicious one and determine similarity.

additional_passwords_to_check.description: List of passwords to try when decrypting the document

Doc_Info_Experimental.description: static document analysis with new features to analyze XLM macros, encrypted macros and more

additional_passwords_to_check.description: List of passwords to try when decrypting the document

DocGuard_Get.description: check if an hash was analyzed on DocGuard. [DocGuard](https://www.docguard.io)

DocGuard_Upload_File.description: Analyze office files in seconds. [DocGuard](https://www.docguard.io) Please register and use api-key to your privacy

Dragonfly_Emulation.description: Emulate malware against [Dragonfly](https://dragonfly.certego.net/?utm_source=intelowl) sandbox by [Certego S.R.L](https://certego.net).

profiles.description: List of profile indices for emulators. Refer to [profiles list](https://dragonfly.certego.net/dashboard/profiles?utm_source=intelowl).

operating_system.description: Enum: `WINDOW`|`LINUX`| or leave blank string for automatic detection

allow_actions.description: If `true`, run actions when a rule matches

private.description: If `true`, mark the analysis as private so it's accessible to you and members within your organization only

url_key_name.description: Dragonfly instance URL. Don't change this.

File_Info.description: basic static analysis, extracts metadata and hashes

FireHol_IPList.description: Check if an IP is in FireHol's IPList. Refer to [FireHol's IPList](https://iplists.firehol.org/).

list_names.description: A list of firehol list names.

FileScan_Upload_File.description: Extract IoCs from executable files, documents and scripts via [FileScan.io API](https://www.filescan.io/api/docs).

FileScan_Search.description: Finds reports and uploaded files by various tokens, like hash, filename, verdict, IOCs etc via [FileScan.io API](https://www.filescan.io/api/docs).

Fortiguard.description: scan an observable with the Fortiguard URL Analyzer

Google_DNS.description: Retrieve current domain resolution with Google DoH (DNS over HTTPS)

query_type.description: Query type against the chosen DNS resolver.

GoogleWebRisk.description: Scan an observable against Web Risk API

GoogleSafebrowsing.description: Scan an observable against GoogleSafeBrowsing DB

GreedyBear.description: scan an IP or a domain against the [GreedyBear](https://www.honeynet.org/2021/12/27/new-project-available-greedybear/) service

url.description: URL of the GreedyBear instance you want to connect to

GreyNoise.description: scan an IP against the Greynoise API (requires API key)

GreyNoiseCommunity.description: scan an IP against the Community Greynoise API

HashLookupServer_Get_Observable.description: check if a md5 or sha1 is available in the database of known file hosted by CIRCL

HashLookupServer_Get_File.description: check if a md5 or sha1 is available in the database of known file hosted by CIRCL

HaveIBeenPwned.description: Check if an email address has been involved in a data breach

honeydb_analysis.description: Choose which endpoint to query from the HoneyDB service (options are: `all`, `scan_twitter`, `ip_query`, `ip_history`, `internet_scanner`, `ip_info`)

Hunter.description: Scans a domain name and returns set of data about the organisation, the email address found and additional information about the people owning those email addresses

HybridAnalysis_Get_File.description: check file hash on HybridAnalysis sandbox reports

HybridAnalysis_Get_Observable.description: search an observable in the HybridAnalysis sandbox reports

rows_limit.description: max number of results to retrieve

datefrom.description: use this in combination with 'dateto' to filter the query

dateto.description: use this in combination with 'datefrom' to filter the query

IntelX_Phonebook.description: Phonebook alike search against IntelX API

rows_limit.description: max number of results to retrieve

Intezer_Get.description: check if an hash was analyzed on Intezer. Register for a free community account [here](https://analyze.intezer.com/sign-in?utm_source=IntelOwl).

Intezer_Scan.description: Scan a file on Intezer. Register for a free community account [here](https://analyze.intezer.com/sign-in?utm_source=IntelOwl).

upload_file.description: Uploads the analyzed file to Intezer in case an analysis of that file is not available in that platform.

InQuest_IOCdb.description: Indicators of Compromise Database - search IOCdb

Manalyze.description: A static analyzer for PE files

MISP.description: scan an observable on a custom MISP instance

ssl_check.description: Enable SSL certificate server verification. Change this if your MISP instance has not SSL enabled

self_signed_certificate.description: If ssl_check and this flag are True, the analyzer will leverage a CA_BUNDLE to authenticate against the MISP instance. IntelOwl will look for it at this path: `configuration/misp_ssl.crt`. Remember that this file should be readable by the application (`www-data` user must read this)

from_days.description: Check only events created in the past X days. 0 for no filter

limit.description: Limit the number of results returned

filter_on_type.description: Filter the search on the type of the observable.

enforce_warninglist.description: Remove any attributes from the result that would cause a hit on a warninglist entry.

strict_search.description: Search strictly on the observable value (True) or search on attributes containing observable value (False)

MISPFIRST.description: scan an observable on the FIRST MISP instance

MISPFIRST_Check_Hash.description: check a file hash on the FIRST MISP instance

MISP_Check_Hash.description: check a file hash on a MISP instance

Malpedia_Scan.description: scan a binary or a zip file (pwd:infected) against all the yara rules available in Malpedia

MalwareBazaar_Get_File.description: Check if a particular malware sample is known to MalwareBazaar

MalwareBazaar_Get_Observable.description: Check if a particular malware hash is known to MalwareBazaar

MalwareBazaar_Google_Observable.description: Check if a particular IP, domain or url is known to MalwareBazaar using google search

MaxMindGeoIP.description: extract GeoIP info for an IP

MWDB_Get.description: check if an hash was analyzed on MWDB

MWDB_Scan.description: Scan a file against MWDB by Cert Polska

max_tries.description: Number of retries to perform for polling analysis results.

ONYPHE.description: search an observable in the ONYPHE

OpenCTI.description: scan an observable on a custom OpenCTI instance

ssl_verify.description: Enable SSL certificate server verification. Change this if your OpenCTI instance has not SSL enabled.

proxies.description: Use these options to pass your request through a proxy server.

exact_search.description: Use this if you want exact matches only for the observables returned.

sections.description: Data are divided into sections, list of sections to download

cof_format.description: Return result in the PassiveDNS [Common Output Format](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-dulaunoy-dnsop-passive-dns-cof/).

Robtex_Forward_PDNS_Query.description: scan a domain against the Robtex Passive DNS DB

arch.description: Change system architecture for the shellcode (x86 or x64).

Spyse.description: Scan domains, IPs, emails and CVEs using Spyse.com's API. Register [here](https://spyse.com/user/registration).

SSAPINet.description: Get a screenshot of a web page using screenshotapi.net. For configuration, Refer to the [docs](https://screenshotapi.net/documentation).

use_proxy.description: Use the `use_proxy` and `proxy` options to pass your request through a proxy server.

proxy.description: Use the `use_proxy` and `proxy` options to pass your request through a proxy server.

output.description: Specify output type (options: `image` i.e. raw base64 encoded image, `json` i.e. containing link)

Stalkphish.description: Check in url or ipv4 if string exists in [Stalkphish.io](https://www.stalkphish.io/) API.

Strings_Info_ML.description: strings extraction plus strings ranking based on Machine Learning. Leverages Fireeye's Stringsifter

Stratosphere_Blacklist.description: Cross reference an IP in blacklist provided by Stratosphere lab

reload_rules.description: Set this to true to force the reload of Rules. Useful in case you just added new custom rules and want to test them. By default the Rules are updated only once a day at UTC 00:00

extended_logs.description: Set this to true to get all the raw logs generated by Suricata

TalosReputation.description: check an IP reputation from Talos downloaded IP list

ThreatFox.description: search for an IOC in ThreatFox's database

Threatminer_PDNS.description: retrieve PDNS data from Threatminer API

Thug_URL_Info.description: Perform hybrid dynamic/static analysis on a URL

TorProject.description: check if an IP is a Tor Exit Node

Onionscan.description: Scans TOR .onion domains for privacy leaks and information disclosures.

Tranco.description: check if a domain is in the last Tranco ranking top sites list

Triage_Search.description: lookup a file hash or an URL in Triage public sandbox Database

endpoint.description: Choose whether to query on the public or the private endpoint of triage (options: `private`, `public`).

report_type.description: Determines how detailed the final report will be (options: `overview`, `complete`).

analysis_type.description: Choose whether to search for existing observable reports or upload for scanning via URL (options: `search` and `submit`).

Triage_Scan_URL.description: analyze an URL using triage sandbox environment

endpoint.description: Choose whether to query on the public or the private endpoint of triage (options: `private`, `public`).

report_type.description: Determines how detailed the final report will be (options: `overview`, `complete`).

analysis_type.description: Choose whether to search for existing observable reports or upload for scanning via URL (options: `search` and `submit`).

Triage_Scan.description: leverage Triage sandbox environment to scan various files

endpoint.description: Choose whether to query on the public or the private endpoint of triage (options: `private`, `public`).

report_type.description: Determines how detailed the final report will be (options: `overview`, `complete`).

URLhaus.description: Query a domain or URL against URLhaus API

UrlScan_Submit_Result.description: Submit & retrieve result of a URL against [URLScan API](https://urlscan.io/docs/api/).

api_key_name.description: API key is mandatory for submit.
API key is optional for search.

Virushee_CheckHash.description: Search for a previous analysis of a file by its hash (SHA256/SHA1/MD5) on [Virushee API](https://api.virushee.com/).

Virushee_Upload_File.description: Check file hash and upload file sample for analysis on [Virushee API](https://api.virushee.com/).

force_scan.description: If true, always upload file for analysis skipping the hash check.

VirusTotal_v2_Get_File.description: check file hash on VirusTotal using old API endpoints

VirusTotal_v2_Get_Observable.description: search an observable in the VirusTotal DB using the old API endpoints

VirusTotal_v2_Scan_File.description: scan a file on VirusTotal using old API endpoints

max_tries.description: How many times we poll the VT API for scan results

poll_distance.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to VT APIs

force_active_scan_if_old.description: If the sample is old, it would be rescanned. This will cost additional quota.

rescan_max_tries.description: How many times we poll the VT API for RE-scan results (samples already available to VT)

rescan_poll_distance.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to VT APIs after having started a RE-scan

days_to_say_that_a_scan_is_old.description: How many days are required to consider a scan old to force rescan

include_behaviour_summary.description: Include a summary of behavioral analysis reports alongside default scan report. This will cost additional quota.

include_sigma_analyses.description: Include sigma analysis report alongside default scan report. This will cost additional quota.

relationships_to_request.description: Include a list of relationships to request if available. Full list [here](https://developers.virustotal.com/reference/metadata). This will cost additional quota.

relationships_elements.description: Number of elements to retrieve for each relationships

VirusTotal_v3_Get_File_And_Scan.description: check file hash on VirusTotal. If not already available, send the sample and perform a new scan

max_tries.description: How many times we poll the VT API for scan results

poll_distance.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to VT APIs

force_active_scan.description: If the sample is not already in VT, send the sample and perform a scan

force_active_scan_if_old.description: If the sample is old, it would be rescanned. This will cost additional quota.

rescan_max_tries.description: How many times we poll the VT API for RE-scan results (samples already available to VT)

rescan_poll_distance.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to VT APIs after having started a RE-scan

days_to_say_that_a_scan_is_old.description: How many days are required to consider a scan old to force rescan

include_behaviour_summary.description: Include a summary of behavioral analysis reports alongside default scan report. This will cost additional quota.

include_sigma_analyses.description: Include sigma analysis report alongside default scan report. This will cost additional quota.

relationships_to_request.description: Include a list of relationships to request if available. This will cost additional quota.

relationships_elements.description: Number of elements to retrieve for each relationships

VirusTotal_v3_Get_Observable.description: search an observable in the VirusTotal DB

max_tries.description: How many times we poll the VT API for scan results

poll_distance.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to VT APIs

force_active_scan_if_old.description: If you submitted an hash and the sample is old, it would be rescanned. This will cost additional quota.

rescan_max_tries.description: How many times we poll the VT API for RE-scan results (samples already available to VT)

rescan_poll_distance.description: IntelOwl would sleep for this time between each poll to VT APIs after having started a RE-scan

days_to_say_that_a_scan_is_old.description: How many days are required to consider a scan old to force rescan

include_behaviour_summary.description: If you submitted an hash, include a summary of behavioral analysis reports alongside default scan report. This will cost additional quota.

include_sigma_analyses.description: If you submitted an hash, include sigma analysis report alongside default scan report. This will cost additional quota.

relationships_to_request.description: Include a list of relationships to request if available. This will cost additional quota.

relationships_elements.description: Number of elements to retrieve for each relationships

VirusTotal_v3_Intelligence_Search.description: perform an advanced query through VirusTotal Intelligence. This is a premium feature only

api_key_name.description: API Key for the analyzer. You need to have a premium license with VT.

limit.description: max number of results to retrieve

Whoisxmlapi.description: the WHOIS record data, of a domain name, an IP address, or an email address

WhoIs_RipeDB_Search.description: Fetch whois record data of an IP address from Ripe DB using their [search API](https://github.com/RIPE-NCC/whois/wiki/WHOIS-REST-API-search)

WiGLE.description: Maps and database of 802.11 wireless networks, with statistics, submitted by wardrivers, netstumblers, and net huggers. Also, the string to be passed in input field of generic analyzers have a format. Different variables are separated by semicolons(`;`) and the field-name and value are separated by equals sign(`=`). Example string for search_type `CDMA Network` is `sid=12345;nid=12345;bsid=12345`.

search_type.description: Corresponds to different routes mentioned in [docs](https://api.wigle.net/swagger#/v3_ALPHA). (options: `WiFi Network`, `CDMA Network`, `Bluetooth Network`, `GSM/LTE/WCDMA Network`).

XForceExchange.description: scan an observable on IBM X-Force Exchange

malware_only.description: Performs lookup only against 'malware' endpoints to save some quota

Yara_Scan_ATM_MALWARE.description: scan a file with ATM Malware yara rules ([github](https://github.com/fboldewin/YARA-rules))

Yara_Scan_Bartblaze.description: Scan a file with Intezer yara rules ([github](https://github.com/bartblaze/Yara-rules)).

Yara_Scan_Community.description: scan a file with community yara rules ([github](https://github.com/Yara-Rules/rules.git))

Yara_Scan_Custom_Signatures.description: scan a file with the Custom Signatures you added in IntelOwl

directories_with_rules.description: Add your own .yar files in the directory /configuration/custom_yara to use your own rules

update.description: This is set to false because these rules are local so they don't need any update

Yara_Scan_Daily_Ioc.description: scan a file with StrangerealIntel daily IOC yara rules ([github](https://github.com/StrangerealIntel/DailyIOC))

Yara_Scan_Florian.description: scan a file with Neo23x0 yara rules ([github](https://github.com/Neo23x0/signature-base.git))

Yara_Scan_Mandiant.description: scan a file with Mandiant yara rules ([github](https://github.com/mandiant/red_team_tool_countermeasures))

Yara_Scan_Inquest.description: scan a file with Inquest yara rules ([github](https://github.com/InQuest/yara-rules))

Yara_Scan_Intezer.description: Scan a file with Intezer yara rules ([github](https://github.com/intezer/yara-rules)).

Yara_Scan_ReversingLabs.description: scan a file with ReversingLabs yara rules ([github](https://github.com/reversinglabs/reversinglabs-yara-rules))

Yara_Scan_Samir.description: scan a file with Samir Threat Hunting yara rules ([github](hhttps://github.com/sbousseaden/YaraHunts))

Yara_Scan_Stratosphere.description: scan a file with Stratosphere yara rules ([github](https://github.com/stratosphereips/yara-rules))

Yara_Scan_Trellix.description: scan a file with Trellix yara rules ([github](https://github.com/advanced-threat-research/Yara-Rules))

Yara_Scan_YARAify.description: Scan a file with yara rules downloaded from [YARAify](https://yaraify.abuse.ch/)

YARAify_File_Scan.description: scan a file against public and non-public YARA and ClamAV signatures in YARAify service

api_key_name.description: Optional key to receive results from public (TLP:WHITE) and non-public (TLP:GREEN, TLP:AMBER and TLP:RED) YARA rules.

api_key_identifier.description: Optional identifier to associate this submission with

send_file.description: Defines whether the file should be sent for analysis or not (in the latter case hash only check would be done)

clamav_scan.description: Defines whether to scan the file with ClamAV.

unpack.description: Defines whether to unpack the file.

share_file.description: Defines whether the file is public and may be shared with 3rd parties.

skip_noisy.description: YARAify skips the file if it already has been scanned at least 10 times within the past 24 hours. It will return the latest task_id instead

skip_known.description: YARAify will not process the file if the file is already known.

YARAify_Generics.description: lookup a YARA rule (default), ClamAV rule, imphash, TLSH, telfhash or icon_dash in YARAify

query.description: using: 'get_yara' for YARA rule (default), 'get_clamav' for ClamAV signature, 'get_imphash' for imphash, 'get_tlsh' for TLSH, 'get_telfhash' for telfhash or 'get_dhash_icon' for icon_dash

result_max.description: Max number of results you want to display (default: 25, max: 1'000)

YARAify_File_Search.description: lookup a file hash in YARAify

api_key_name.description: Optional key to receive results from public (TLP:WHITE) and also non-public (TLP:GREEN, TLP:AMBER and TLP:RED) YARA rules.

YARAify_Search.description: lookup a file hash in YARAify

api_key_name.description: Optional key to receive results from public (TLP:WHITE) and also non-public (TLP:GREEN, TLP:AMBER and TLP:RED) YARA rules.

YETI.description: scan an observable on a custom YETI instance

api_key_name.description: API key for your YETI instance

url_key_name.description: API URL of your YETI instance

verify_ssl.description: Enable SSL certificate server verification. Change this if your YETI instance has not SSL enabled.

regex.description: Use this if you are searching for observables using a regex.

results_count.description: Use this to limit the maximum number of results obtained from a search.

ZoomEye.description: Cyberspace Search Engine recording information of devices, websites, services, components etc. [Host search: docs](https://www.zoomeye.org/doc#host-search).

search_type.description: Choose among `host`, `web`, `both` (both is only available to ZoomEye VIP users).

query.description: Follow according to docs, but omit `ip`, `hostname`. Eg: `city:beijing port:21`.

facets.description: A comma-separated list of properties to get summary information on query. Eg: `facets:app,os`.
